services.title: OEM & Custom
services.body: Looking for tailored solutions? Avam’s OEM & custom services deliver fast, next-day* customizations designed to meet your unique specifications.

services.title: New Research & Lab
services.body: Starting a new lab or have a new grant? Avam’s New Lab program offers exclusive discounts, expert guidance, and full support to help you get up and running quickly.

services.title: Instrument Trade Up
services.body: Upgrade your lab with Avam’s Instrument Trade Up program. Get credit towards new, advanced systems when you trade in your older equipment.
